local_intent: Complete the transfer phase: verify place_pose is available, move above the place pose, lower until contact, place the white plate, open gripper and ensure the plate is released, then retreat.
assumptions: place_pose key exists on the blackboard and references the red plate center
Workspace unchanged since place_pose was computed
Gripper hardware responsive to open command
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer steps from GLOBAL_BT: move above the red plate center (place_pose), descend until contact, place the white plate, release it, verify release, and retreat to safe height.
